channel.title: Problem logging in
channel.description: I got everything connected but when I try to log in, it would allow me. I checked in the playerloginhandler but I don't know what to change and I also checked in MySQL but I also don't know what to check. If anyone can help me find the solution thank you very much! [img]http://s22.postimg.org/mo040kn75/Error.png[/img]

item.title: Problem logging in
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

You’re using the correct database? Also It may be tryin to load a table for your character that doesn’t exist, compare it and add it to the database.

Read full topic
